title: Construction Simulator Deluxe Edition (v1.6) [Multi-12]
description:
Construction Simulator Deluxe Edition (v1.6) [Multi-12] 

1. Mount the image, install the game.
2. Copy the contents of the SmartSteamLoader folder 
   into the folder with the installed game.
3. Start the game - SmartSteamLoader.exe.

*** Change language in the game:

Open "SmartSteamEmu.ini" with any text editor, and in the line "Language = ********", specify any required.

Language: 
Russian, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish,
Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Japanese, Turkish, Br. Portuguese
